parameters.name: BySqlId
parameters.description: Specifies whether to bind by SQLID/SQLText. Default value: true.

parameters.name: DynamicSql
parameters.description:
Specifies whether the specified SQL statements are dynamic SQL statements.
> This parameter specifies whether the values of the `SqlId` parameter are the IDs of dynamic SQL statements.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description:
The end time of querying the SQL execution plan.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the OceanBase cluster.

parameters.name: IsConcurrentLimit
parameters.description:
- When the value is set to True, the throttling information in the database is queried based on the SQL ID.   
- When the value is set to False, the bound index or execution plan in the database is queried based on the SQL ID.

parameters.name: MaxConcurrent
parameters.description: The maximum number of outline binding tasks that can be initiated at a time.

parameters.name: SqlId
parameters.description: The ID of the SQL statement.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description:
The start time of querying the TOPSQL parameter.   
The value must be UTC time in the format of YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.

parameters.name: StatementId
parameters.description: The ID of the SQL template.

parameters.name: UId
parameters.description: The user identifier (UID) of the OceanBase database.
